name: Pokémon Red, White, and Blue
storyline: PETA helped Pokémon liberate themselves from their trainers in Pokémon: Black & Blue, but giant corporations are still exploiting Pokémon for nefarious purposes. Are Pokémon profits earned at the expense of animals' well-being? Join PETA as we help Pikachu and his Pokémon friends journey to America to unravel a conspiracy that affects us all!
summary: Once again, PETA makes an Adobe Flash game parodying the iconic Pokemon franchise to boycott big name fast food restaurants.
